imdb.plot outline: Rockstars in their own right, bottle girls are the nucleus to the high-rolling night life universe. They are what make night life intoxicating and desirable. Miami is the hub of the bottle girls' hustle. Thousands of beautiful women move to major cities daily with high hopes of attaining fame, fast cash and a piece of the high-life. Very few beauties are afforded the opportunity to enter the exclusive bottle girls realm. Being a bottle girl isn't just a job it's an envied lifestyle.
imdb.title: Bottle Girls
plot: Rockstars in their own right, bottle girls are the nucleus to the high-rolling night life universe. They are what make night life intoxicating and desirable. Miami is the hub of the bottle girls' hustle. Thousands of beautiful women move to major cities daily with high hopes of attaining fame, fast cash and a piece of the high-life. Very few beauties are afforded the opportunity to enter the exclusive bottle girls realm. Being a bottle girl isn't just a job it's an envied lifestyle.
